properties.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 5 at 3:53AM MST until February 8 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and Eastern Sawatch Mountains
Above 11000 Feet.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to midnight MST Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind
chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed
skin in as little as 10 minutes.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MST FRIDAY NIGHT
